name: @bscotch/rumpus-ce
description: Rumpus CE (Community Edition) SDK, for writing applications that talk to Levelhead and other Butterscotch Shenanigans resources.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && npx tsc && npx webpack
scripts.preversion: git checkout develop && git fetch origin --prune && npm run build && npm test
scripts.postversion: git push origin develop && git checkout master && git merge develop && git push origin master && npm publish && git checkout develop

author: Adam Coster
